review: Why would the voice search not work for Netflix.  This rating really is kind of harsh because the device is amazing.  However, I'm sorry Amazon, your video service doesn't even sniff Netflix and I don't like that your voice search tried to push it on me.On a side note, I've heard that they will get voice search for Netflix up and going in future updates.Please do this update ASAP so I can change the rating to 5 stars.All this being said, it really is an amazing device.  I have an Apple TV as well as this and the only plus that Apple has over this is the easy device mirroring.  There are apps that do it as well on the Android, but I am yet to come across one that works half as well.  Other than that, I love the Android flexibility and love that Amazon despite their limited App Store has left the door open with side-loading apps if someone wants to try other apps at their own risk.Despite my harsh rating because of the ludicrous voice search limitations, please do buy this device because it is awesome and hopefully by the time you do, voice search will also work with Netflix.
